item.title: Hair Salon
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
[vc_row full_width="stretch_row_content_no_spaces" row_alternate_logo="1" el_id="home" css=".vc_custom_1480337157105{margin-top: 0px !important;margin-right: 0px !important;margin-bottom: 0px !important;margin-left: 0px !important;padding-top: 0px !important;padding-right: 0px !important;padding-bottom: 0px !important;padding-left: 0px !important;}"][vc_column][rev_slider_vc alias="typewriter-effect"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width="stretch_row_content_no_spaces" css=".vc_custom_1478981060399{margin-top: 0px !important;margin-right: 0px !important;margin-bottom: 0px !important;margin-left: 0px !important;padding-top: 0px !important;padding-right: 0px !important;padding-bottom: 0px !important;padding-left: 0px !important;}"][vc_column width="1/2" css=".vc_custom_1478896271143{margin-top: 0px !important;padding-top: 100px !important;padding-right: 15% !important;padding-left: 15% !important;}"][ozy_vc_divider caption_size="h1" caption="A World Class Hair Company" border_size="2" border_color="#000000" caption_position="top" more_custom="on" width="40px" css_animation="bottom-to-top"][vc_custom_heading text="Bespoke colour services, beautiful hairdressing" font_container="tag:h4|text_align:center|color:%23000000" google_fonts="font_family:Vollkorn%3Aregular%2Citalic%2C700%2C700italic|font_style:400%20regular%3A400%3Anormal" css_animation="fadeIn"][vc_column_text css_animation="fadeIn"]

The Alex Wilson salons offer world class colour services and beautiful, bespoke hairdressing. Alex is an award winning colourist that has handpicked and trained his teams to deliver the very best personalised colour, style and experience. Every team member is respectful, inclusive and inspired to deliver a tailored style that supports a unique philosophy – natural beauty enhancement in hair.

[/vc_column_text][vc_btn title="FIND OUT MORE" style="classic" shape="square" color="black" align="center" css_animation="fadeIn" row_use_extended_content="on" button_block="true" link="|||"]   The Salon is an established hair and beauty centre and specialised skincare clinic in New York, offering a complete hair and beauty makeover and Spa experience. A professional approach, always up-to-date with the latest developments, and a sincere interest in every person in search of their personal beauty: this is today the key to the success of The Salon, the hair and beauty professionals. The aim is for everyone who joins the salon experience to feel inspired, and guided with affection towards realizing themselves. Opened in 2002 by Alex Wilson, The Salon was born from a strong desire to follow a new kind of approach to the world of hair and beauty and from observing and assessing for the whole of Alex’s professional career the influence that hair and beauty treatments have in modern life on our perception of ourselves and our relations with others. Everything at The Salon has the aim of releasing your inner beauty and giving you more confidence in front of the world. The Salon is an independent hair and beauty salon where you will receive the most careful and professional treatments, carefully selected from the hair and beauty market to meet the highest expectations of the men and women of today. Right from your first visit you can look forward to a complementary consultation. So that we can get to know you and create a treatment plan – on your terms, not ours!
Our Mission :
We beleive that excellence and optimal customer satisfaction can only be acheived through one-on-one integrity, personal attention, personal attitude, creativity and quality service at affordable prices.... because your satisfaction is our success!!!
Our Goal:
Our ongoing goal is to exceed the expectations of our individual, group and corporate clients with hand on professional service...
Expertise :
To improvise the western style with traditional touch...[/vc_btn][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/2"][vc_single_image image="28" img_size="full" alignment="center" css_animation="fadeIn" css=".vc_custom_1479145674568{margin-bottom: 0px !important;padding-bottom: 0px !important;}"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width="stretch_row" row_alternate_logo="1" css=".vc_custom_1481057940637{margin-top: 0px !important;margin-bottom: 0px !important;padding-top: 0px !important;padding-bottom: 0px !important;background-color: #000000 !important;}"][vc_column css=".vc_custom_1479044142181{margin-bottom: 0px !important;padding-bottom: 0px !important;}"][vc_cta h2="Give the gift of beauty and relaxation with a Little Black Giftcard from The Salon or Spa Salon. Please give us a call today or send us an email for more information." h2_font_container="font_size:20|color:%23ffffff|line_height:26px" h2_use_theme_fonts="yes" shape="square" style="custom" add_button="right" btn_title="PURCHASE ONLINE" btn_style="outline" btn_shape="square" btn_color="white" btn_align="left" css_animation="fadeIn" use_custom_fonts_h2="true" custom_background="#000000" custom_text="#ffffff" css=".vc_custom_1479145717208{margin-bottom: 0px !important;border-top-width: 1px !important;border-right-width: 1px !important;border-bottom-width: 1px !important;border-left-width: 1px !important;padding-bottom: 0px !important;border-left-color: #000000 !important;border-left-style: solid !important;border-right-color: #000000 !important;border-right-style: solid !important;border-top-color: #000000 !important;border-top-style: solid !important;border-bottom-color: #000000 !important;border-bottom-style: solid !important;}"][/vc_cta][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width="stretch_row_content_no_spaces" full_height="yes" css=".vc_custom_1481552974386{margin-top: 0px !important;margin-right: 0px !important;margin-bottom: 0px !important;margin-left: 0px !important;padding-top: 0px !important;padding-right: 0px !important;padding-bottom: 0px !important;padding-left: 0px !important;}"][vc_column column_use_custom_typography="1" column_use_custom_typography_color="#ffffff" css=".vc_custom_1481553223262{margin-top: 0px !important;margin-bottom: 0px !important;padding-top: 0px !important;padding-bottom: 0px !important;}"][ozy_vc_callboxwrapper][ozy_vc_expandablecallbox image_large="960" bg_color="rgba(0,0,0,0.94)" title="Body"]

̶  Restore hydrated silkiness to skin.

Enjoy one of our luxury body treatments for skin that radiates with health and is soft to the touch. Carefully balanced to both deeply cleanse and replenish, our body treatments lift the veil of dullness and dryness to restore hydrated silkiness to skin.[/ozy_vc_expandablecallbox][ozy_vc_expandablecallbox image_large="959" title="Hair"]

̶  A total transformation

Hair says a lot about who you are and reflects your style.Our hair salon services include hair cuts and styles and a variety of treatments. Hair service prices listed below are starting prices. Please call your local spa for exact pricing.[/ozy_vc_expandablecallbox][ozy_vc_expandablecallbox image_large="1214" title="Facial"]

̶  An  elevated experience with remarkable results.

Our spa facial treatments offer an elevated experience with remarkable results. Each facial pampers with a warm mitt hand treatment, a heated pad for comfort, post-extraction cool stone application and our specialized facial massage.[/ozy_vc_expandablecallbox][ozy_vc_expandablecallbox image_large="1276" title="Makeup"]

̶  A beauty accessory subtle, just enough or bold.

Our professional makeup services are a beauty accessory. Subtle, just enough or bold. Your essence should be complemented, yet never changed. The creative touch of our makeup artists can bring out the best in you and we can even show you how to do it yourself. Bridal and special occasion services available.[/ozy_vc_expandablecallbox][ozy_vc_expandablecallbox image_large="962" title="Nails"]

̶  Polished and painted to perfection.

Our spa manicure and pedicure services soothe with a warm neck pillow. Skin exfoliation and a hydrating massage are extended to the elbow for manicures and to the knee for pedicures, which also include a customized foot bath with essential oil. A paraffin treatment seals in moisture for softer hands and feet. Nails are polished to perfection with our luxury nail care services.[/ozy_vc_expandablecallbox][/ozy_vc_callboxwrapper][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width="stretch_row" css_animation="fadeInUpBig" css=".vc_custom_1479044155863{margin-top: 100px !important;margin-bottom: 0px !important;padding-bottom: 0px !important;}"][vc_column][ozy_vc_divider caption_size="h1" caption="Artistic Directors" border_size="2" border_color="#000000" caption_position="top" more_custom="on" width="40px" css_animation="bottom-to-top"][vc_column_text css=".vc_custom_1479043537600{margin-top: 0px !important;padding-top: 0px !important;}"]

Get to know the visionaries behind our artistic collections, photo shoots and hair shows.

item.title: Booking
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded: [vc_row full_width="stretch_row_content" css=".vc_custom_1479481856194{background-image: url(http://s3.amazonaws.com/salontheme/uploads/2016/11/floral_bg.png?id=279) !important;}"][vc_column width="1/3"][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/3"][vc_single_image image="281" img_size="full" alignment="center" onclick="custom_link" css_animation="zoomInUp" link="#booking"][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/3"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width="stretch_row_content" css=".vc_custom_1479300816443{margin-top: 0px !important;margin-bottom: 0px !important;padding-top: 60px !important;padding-right: 5% !important;padding-bottom: 40px !important;padding-left: 5% !important;background-color: #f8f4ee !important;}" el_id="booking"][vc_column width="1/3"][ozy_vc_divider caption_size="h4" caption="Online Appointment Guide" border_size="2" border_color="#000000" caption_align="left" caption_position="top" more_custom="on" width="40px" align="left"][vc_column_text css=".vc_custom_1479298206390{margin-top: 20px !important;}"]1.  If you have gender request for your therapists or have request for one specific therapist, please call us instead of online booking. 2. Please be on time. First time clients need to be 15 minutes early to fill up in-take form and find parking. Returning clients are recommended to arrive 5 minutes early. While we do our best to accommodate late customers, sometimes they receive shorter session. 3. Our booking system  supports cancellation and rescheduling online if you choose to create an account with us. If you want to cancel or reschedule, please login and do so 24 hours before the appointment. Or you can always call us. To ensure your request is processed timely please don’t email to cancel or reschedule your appointment.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/3"][ozy_vc_divider caption_size="h4" caption="Online Request" border_size="2" border_color="#000000" caption_align="left" caption_position="top" more_custom="on" width="40px" align="left"][vc_column_text css=".vc_custom_1479300041672{margin-top: 20px !important;}"][booked-calendar][/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/3"][ozy_vc_divider caption_size="h4" caption="Direction and Parking" border_size="2" border_color="#000000" caption_align="left" caption_position="top" more_custom="on" width="40px" align="left"][vc_empty_space height="35px"][ozy_vc_prettymap height="450px" address_="3824 Deans Lane, New York, NY " custom_icon="598" hue="#005d9b"]3824 Deans Lane, New York, NY 10011 Phone : 914-816-1182 [/ozy_vc_prettymap][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width="stretch_row" full_height="yes" content_placement="middle" parallax="content-moving" parallax_image="229" row_alternate_logo="1"][vc_column][vc_custom_heading text="STARTING FROM $30" font_container="tag:h4|text_align:center|color:%23ffffff" use_theme_fonts="yes" css_animation="none"][vc_custom_heading text="Rejuvenate with Exvlusive Savings on a Manicure & Pedicure!" font_container="tag:h1|text_align:center|color:%23ffffff" use_theme_fonts="yes" css_animation="none" css=".vc_custom_1480073888135{padding-right: 15% !important;padding-left: 15% !important;}"][vc_btn title="VIEW OFFER" style="outline" shape="square" color="white" align="center" css_animation="none" css=".vc_custom_1480073895034{margin-top: 30px !important;}"][/vc_btn][/vc_column][/vc_row]

item.title: About
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
[vc_row full_width="stretch_row" content_placement="middle" parallax="content-moving" parallax_image="644" row_alternate_logo="1" css=".vc_custom_1482179662724{margin-top: 0px !important;margin-bottom: 0px !important;padding-top: 250px !important;padding-bottom: 250px !important;}"][vc_column][vc_custom_heading text="Salon offers up-to-date hair services for women and men in a relaxing environment. Our stylists give you personalized attention to make sure you are satisfied every time you visit." font_container="tag:h2|text_align:left|color:%23ffffff" use_theme_fonts="yes" css_animation="none"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row gap="35" css=".vc_custom_1479932281934{margin-top: 0px !important;margin-bottom: 0px !important;padding-top: 100px !important;padding-bottom: 100px !important;}"][vc_column width="1/2"][vc_custom_heading text="Welcome to" font_container="tag:h1|font_size:80|text_align:left|color:%23b09d5d|line_height:70px" google_fonts="font_family:Lovers%20Quarrel%3Anormal|font_style:400%20regular%3A400%3Anormal" css_animation="none"][vc_column_text css_animation="none" css=".vc_custom_1482155884267{margin-top: -30px !important;}"]

    Beauty Salon

We are a full-service salon centrally located in Manhattan.  We have been in business for over 25 years.  Specializing in the art of color, including corrective color and dimensional foil highlighting, we strive to enhance our clients' inner and outer beauty. At Salon Company, we believe in ongoing education!  Because we specialize in color, we have studied with some of the USA's leading color experts, including those at the L'Oreal Professional’s Soho Academy in NYC and in Guilford .  Our Hair Designers go to several workshops and training seminars a year.  We also hold in-house education monthly for our staff. We strive to have a fun, uplifting, friendly atmosphere with some of the most professional hair designers around.  When in our salon, you'll be treated with great service.  We give thorough and expert consultations before the start of your service. You'll know exactly what to expect and what you're getting before the start of your service.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/2"][ozy_vc_regular_carousel navigation_dots="false"][ozy_vc_carousel_item image="651"][ozy_vc_carousel_item image="650"][/ozy_vc_regular_carousel][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row gap="35" css=".vc_custom_1479933082791{margin-top: 0px !important;margin-bottom: 0px !important;padding-top: 0px !important;padding-bottom: 100px !important;}"][vc_column width="1/2"][vc_single_image image="661" img_size="full" alignment="center" css_animation="none"][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/2"][vc_column_text css_animation="none"]

The Story of Salon

Gina Wild is a family owned brand led by two generations of uniquely skilled hair professionals. Gina has personally played a significant role in the development of modern hairdressing techniques. We work with the colouring, hair texture and complexion that nature gives each client and then we optimise and enhance their style, creating natural looking, beautiful hair. The salons offer bespoke haircuts, tailored colour services, blowdry services, wedding hair and celebration styling, extensions, ‘permanent’ blowdrys, conditioning treatments and the very best haircare in the business. Janice wants to thank you in advance for considering her for the opportunity to serve you and your family’s hair care needs.  Added to the best shampoo in the West, she will guarantee you a 5 minute stress relieving scalp massage with relaxing music. All of your cares will go down the drain.  Guaranteed. Cutting hair is only part of Janice’s job. Cutting your hair the way you want it is everything. With 25 years experience she is committed to first listening, then cutting. Along with cutting, styling and product knowledge you will have the added value of coloring the hair to compliment your haircut. This in her opinion can take a regular haircut and turn it in to the hair style you've always wanted. As a professional she is committed to consistently providing you with excellent customer service. She takes pride in offering you the most current updated looks, and top of the line Paul Mitchell product and color system. She will personally give you the education you deserve on proper product usage. Last, but not least, she is committed to continuing her education, so she can be the best she can be, this she knows is important to you. At your scheduled time together, she will look forward to providing you with the best service you will ever experience![/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row parallax="content-moving" parallax_image="662" css_animation="fadeIn" css=".vc_custom_1479934715350{margin-top: 0px !important;margin-bottom: 100px !important;padding-top: 150px !important;padding-bottom: 150px !important;}"][vc_column][vc_custom_heading text="A World Class Hair Company " font_container="tag:h2|text_align:center|color:%23ffffff" use_theme_fonts="yes" css_animation="none" css=".vc_custom_1480073807070{margin-bottom: 0px !important;padding-bottom: 0px !important;}"][vc_custom_heading text="Bespoke colour services, beautiful hairdressing " font_container="tag:h4|text_align:center|color:%23ffffff" use_theme_fonts="yes" css_animation="none" css=".vc_custom_1480073812289{margin-top: 0px !important;padding-top: 0px !important;}"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row gap="35" css=".vc_custom_1479935039542{margin-top: 0px !important;margin-bottom: 0px !important;padding-top: 0px !important;padding-bottom: 100px !important;}"][vc_column width="1/2"][ozy_vc_divider caption_size="h4" caption="Client Testimonials" border_size="2" border_color="#000000" caption_align="left" caption_position="top" more_custom="on" width="40px" align="left"][vc_custom_heading text="I am amazed and grateful for the support and friendship I enjoy with my Clients. Their words both humble and lift me at the same time!" font_container="tag:h3|text_align:left|color:%23000000" use_theme_fonts="yes" css_animation="none" css=".vc_custom_1482155925018{margin-top: 30px !important;}"][vc_separator css=".vc_custom_1479934156665{margin-top: 30px !important;margin-bottom: 30px !important;}"][ozy_vc_blockquotebox sub_title1="Jaime Hernandez"]Color and trim were fabulous. Product use guidance is always so appreciated. Love new salon, Artistic Edge. Such a convenient location. Gina is the best -- don't hesitate to visit this great new salon.[/ozy_vc_blockquotebox][vc_separator css=".vc_custom_1479934156665{margin-top: 30px !important;margin-bottom: 30px !important;}"][ozy_vc_blockquotebox image_align="right" sub_title1="Angie Colt"]Gina has been keeping my whole family stylish for the past ten years - we love Gina! Definitely book your next appointment here![/ozy_vc_blockquotebox][vc_separator css=".vc_custom_1479934156665{margin-top: 30px !important;margin-bottom: 30px !important;}"][ozy_vc_blockquotebox sub_title1="Hannah Al Gor"]You are the coolest!!! you did what i want and you didn't push me into cutting my hair any shorter thank you so much! i love it!![/ozy_vc_blockquotebox][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/2"][vc_single_image image="674" img_size="full" alignment="center" css_animation="none"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width="stretch_row_content" full_height="yes" content_placement="middle" css_animation="fadeIn" row_alternate_logo="1" css=".vc_custom_1479935074171{margin-top: 0px !important;margin-bottom: 0px !important;background-image: url(http://s3.amazonaws.com/salontheme/uploads/2016/11/shutterstock_458904496-compressor.jpg?id=685) !important;}"][vc_column width="1/2" css=".vc_custom_1479935121268{padding-left: 10% !important;}"][vc_custom_heading text="Luxury Hairdressing" font_container="tag:h1|font_size:140|text_align:left|color:%23ffffff|line_height:120px" google_fonts="font_family:Cormorant%20Garamond%3Anormal%3Aitalic|font_style:normal%3A300%20light%3A300%20italic%3A400%20regular%3A400%20italic%3A500%20medium%3A500%20italic%3A600%20semi-bold%3A600%20italic%3A700%20bold%3A700%20italic" css_animation="none" css=".vc_custom_1482155940853{margin-bottom: 0px !important;padding-bottom: 0px !important;}"][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/2"][/vc_column][/vc_row]

The aim is for everyone who joins the salon experience to feel inspired, and guided with affection towards realizing themselves. Opened in 2002 by Alex Wilson, The Salon was born from a strong desire to follow a new kind of approach to the world of hair and beauty and from observing and assessing for the whole of Alex’s professional career the influence that hair and beauty treatments have in modern life on our perception of ourselves and our relations with others. Everything at The Salon has the aim of releasing your inner beauty and giving you more confidence in front of the world. The Salon is an independent hair and beauty salon where you will receive the most careful and professional treatments, carefully selected from the hair and beauty market to meet the highest expectations of the men and women of today. Right from your first visit you can look forward to a complementary consultation. So that we can get to know you and create a treatment plan – on your terms, not ours!

He specializes in coloring, custom blending, highlights, lowlights, and color corrections using L’Oreal Professionel Coloring and Scruples Blazing highlighting system. Alex is also certified in the Brazilian Blowout smoothing treatment, an amazing treatment that smoothes and defrizzes hair, leaving it silky and shiny. Alex mastered his haircutting skills through extended training at Paul Mitchell, Toni & Guy, Rusk, and ICON academies.
